resources.string: "It iz a monki. A big monki with a noze dat coould doouble as a javelin. Don't be surprised if it starts narrating its own tragicomic tale in a raspy voice…"
"This small superior hairy fluffy white crown is the mark of a mischievous monarch ruling over a kingdom of chaos."
"This big black monki is the embodiment of nature's forgotten nightmares, poster child for a woodland underworld…"
"This baboon is the prankster of the savannah, the jester of the thornbush court, and the master of monkey business that even Shakespeare couldn't have scripted."
